title: Consolas available for Visual Studio users
content: The Consolas fixed pitch ClearType Collection font family has been made available as a [download](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013095613/http:/www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=22e69ae4-7e40-4807-8a86-b3d36fab68d3&displaylang=en) for licensed Visual Studio users.
author: Si_Daniels
